results.name: a(0) = 0, for n >= 1, a(n) = A275736(n) OR a(A257684(n)), where OR is given by A003986.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40320
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
formula: a(0) = 0, for n >= 1, a(n) = A275736(n) OR a(A257684(n)), where OR is given by A003986.
program: (Scheme, two versions, first one using memoization-macro definec)
(definec (A276010 n) (if (zero? n) n (A003986bi (A275736 n) (A276010 (A257684 n))))) ;; Where A003986bi implements bitwise-OR (A003986)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 17 2016
